DialogueOption.Text: Gabbro, did you tell Arkose something about ghost matter disappearing?
What's with the campfire right outside the cove there?

Dialogue.Page: Hm? Oh yea, I noticed that on my last trip here.
That smart lil' cookie noticed the same thing back on Timber Hearth, and asked me about it last time I visited the village.
You know the Little Scout has a feature that tells you if there's danger where you shoot it, right?
It works great for scouting out ghost matter. Lights up a warning when you shoot it into a patch of the deadly stuff - which is sweet if you tend to forget the invisible deadly stuff is there.
Well, one time, I was using it to scout a big patch of ghost matter on one of the other islands. Just left it down in case I forgot it was there.
But suddenly, the scout suddenly starts saying it's safe!
That's weird, right? Must be some quirk with the sensors, I thought.
But I took some photos with the scout camera too, and lo and behold - the ghost matter really was gone!
Weirder, a moment later, the scout says there's danger again.. And the ghost matter was back in the photos, too.
Wasn't a one-off, either - though I've noticed it seems to happen on this island more than any of the other islands with ghost matter I've come across, for whatever reason.

I haven't actually like.. stuck a limb into the ghost matter to know for sure if the ghost matter really vanishes when that happens. <Pause=1> I don't know if I trust Slate's tech more than my common sense, y'know?
I made Arkose seriously promise me not to do anything dumb trying to learn about this stuff. I hope they've listened.
I know ghost matter evaporates away with time, but isn't that supposed to take ages? The few patches I've found all look like they've got a long way to go.
But hey, there's some ghost matter right in the cove back there. Feel free to check it out with your scout if you're feeling curious.
Just be careful, alright? There's a campfire up the hill you can patch up by if you happen to get hurt messing with the stuff.

DialogueOption.Text: Can't I use the campfire outside the cove there?

Dialogue.Page: Oh, you can light that one back up if you want. Just uh, don't use it for napping.
I've woken up wet and groggy literally every time I slept at that campfire.. Well, wetter and groggier than usual, sleeping on Giant's Deep.
Just a bad spot for a campfire, I guess.
Sweet. Stay safe out there, time buddy.
